message: fix sql mspace race condition dohsql 1876 sqlite engine mspace thread safe supposed accessed engine unfortunately dohsql break assumption master engine casting mem object need reallocate zmalloc mspace child engine may decide reuse discard cached mem object therefore free zmalloc mem object also allocated master mspace race shown   child engine   inner_row dohsql.c  add_row dohsql.c add mem queue  master sql engine   next_row sqlinterfaces.c  dohsql.c  grab child engine  send_row sqlinterfaces.c  column_value vdbeapi.c  apply affinity vdbemem.c e.g.  sqlite3malloc malloc.c child engine mspace_malloc dlmalloc.c  inner_row dohsql.c next_row sqlinterfaces.c add_row dohsql.c dohsql.c add mem queue return child engine grab child engine  inner_row dohsql.c  trimque dohsql.c send_row sqlinterfaces.c vdbeaux.c column_value vdbeapi.c  apply affinity vdbemem.c e.g.  sqlite3malloc malloc.c sqlite3_free malloc.c  mspace_malloc dlmalloc.c mspace_free dlmalloc.c  race condition non thread safe mspace shared engine  obvious fix make sql mspace thread safe however would incur unnecessary locking overhead non parallelizable query instead use mutex guard mem object need ensure always hold mutex whenever casting reusing discarding mem object inside dohsql subsystem drqs 150091313
